channel.title: The Akatsuki Organisation
channel.description:
Well I'm not trying to attract casey to playing the game or anything but I'm starting up a "clan" called The Akatsuki with the original characters from Naruto.
[table] [tr][td][b]Character[/b][/td] [td][b]Username[/b][/td][/tr] [tr][td]Pein:[/td] [td]SteamTempest[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Itachi:[/td] [td]Reyx7[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Deidara:[/td] [td]Kracky~[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Sasori:[/td] [td]Rip4d[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Konan:[/td] [td]Cole1497[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Zetsu: [/td][/tr] [tr][td]Kisame:[/td] [td]Agl1431[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Kakuzu: [/td][/tr] [tr][td]Hidan: [/td][/tr] [tr][td]Akasuna: [/td][/tr] [tr][td]Tobi:[/td][/tr] [/table]
Please put down your Username(MC) and which character you would like to be You are required to have a skin that looks like the Character, if you cannot find one I'll help you. Remake one
If you have any questions just post below, oh and I'll show you our Village that is still in construction when we are both online.

item.title: The Akatsuki Organisation
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Hi, i would like to join the akatsuki Organisation.
I do have 2 houses and a hotel in haven but i am not part of a clan.

Just assign a character and i will try to find out something about him/her.
I do not have a paid account (yet) Because i do not have any online money.
Ill try to find an exploit wish allows me to have a custom skin.

Greetings, Whattehp406.

Read full topic

item.title: The Akatsuki Organisation
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:49, topic:378172”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=474054.msg3469166#msg3469166 date=1295157188]

So if we are the Akatsuki, who is going to dare be the black ops?

Akatsuki isn’t related to Black Ops, is it?
Also, send me a game invite next time you’re on. I want to rape you.
[/quote]The black ops are meant to stop the Akatsuki from getting Naruto(If I know the stop right).[/quote]

ANBU Black ops.

Basically it’s everyone’s job to stop Akatsuki from getting Naruto.

Read full topic
